remarks: Unique existence proper of a member of the domain of the least upper bound function of a poset.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
statement:
lubval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lubval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lubval.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
lubval.p $e |- ( ps <-> ( A. y e. S y .<_ x /\ A. z e. B ( A. y e. S y .<_ z -> x .<_ z ) ) ) $.
lubval.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
lubeleu.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. dom U ) $.
lubeu $p |- ( ph -> E! x e. B ps ) $.
$d B x z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
